nodes.text: Ameron was an animal whose skin was used for clothing. Lando Calrissian told Trandoshan vendor, Borkus that he was not selling him ameron skin. This offended Borkus who threatened Lando.
Ameron first appeared in Lando - Double or Nothing 1 as skin. The comic was written by Rodney Barnes and illustrated by Paolo Villanelli. It was published on May 30, 2018.
